response.original_title: Dreams Live On: Countdown to Tokyo
response.overview: The special features the first interview with Bach after the announcement, plus Hirshland discussing why the USOPC supported the postponement. NBC Olympics swimming analyst Rowdy Gaines offers his perspective as an athlete who missed the 1980 Moscow Games due to the U.S. boycott, then earned gold four years later.
response.title: Dreams Live On: Countdown to Tokyo
